includedAssets.title: Smoke Gets In Your Eyes
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep1 - Smoke Gets In Your Eyes
includedAssets.synopsis: From Matthew Weiner (The Sopranos) comes this stylish drama set in 1960s New York City during the high-powered and glamorous Golden Age of advertising.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Stylish drama set in 1960s New York City during the high-powered and glamorous Golden Age of advertising.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: From Matthew Weiner (The Sopranos) comes this stylish drama set in 1960s New York City during the high-powered and glamorous Golden Age of advertising.

includedAssets.title: Ladies Room
includedAssets.synopsis: While Don comes under pressure to get involved in the Richard Nixon presidential campaign, Peggy receives unwanted attention from a copywriter.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Don comes under pressure to get involved in the Richard Nixon presidential campaign, Peggy receives unwanted attention from a copywriter.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Don comes under pressure to get involved in the Richard Nixon presidential campaign, Peggy receives unwanted attention from a copywriter.

includedAssets.title: Marriage Of Figaro
includedAssets.synopsis: Pete returns from his honeymoon excited about his new marriage but conflicted about his encounter with Peggy. Plus, Betty sets local tongues wagging.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Pete returns from his honeymoon excited about his new marriage but conflicted about his encounter with Peggy. Plus, Betty sets local tongues wagging.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Pete returns from his honeymoon excited about his new marriage but conflicted about his encounter with Peggy. Plus, Betty sets local tongues wagging.

includedAssets.title: New Amsterdam
includedAssets.synopsis: Pete's professional and personal lives become more complicated as he struggles to assert power in both.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Pete's professional and personal lives become more complicated as he struggles to assert power in both.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Pete's professional and personal lives become more complicated as he struggles to assert power in both.

includedAssets.title: 5G
includedAssets.synopsis: Don must deal with the fallout when a photo recalls a past he isn't ready to confront. Plus, a success for Ken causes jealousy among his colleagues.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Don must deal with the fallout when a photo recalls a past he isn't ready to confront. Plus, a success for Ken causes jealousy among his colleagues.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Don must deal with the fallout when a photo recalls a past he isn't ready to confront. Plus, a success for Ken causes jealousy among his colleagues.

includedAssets.title: Babylon
includedAssets.synopsis: At a brainstorming session, Peggy proves to be more than just a secretary and her future at the agency looks much brighter.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: At a brainstorming session, Peggy proves to be more than just a secretary and her future at the agency looks much brighter.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: At a brainstorming session, Peggy proves to be more than just a secretary and her future at the agency looks much brighter.

includedAssets.title: Red In The Face
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep7 - Red In The Face
includedAssets.synopsis: A boys' night out for Roger and Don ends badly, while Pete encounters problems on the home front as he and Trudy adjust to being married.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A boys' night out for Roger and Don ends badly, while Pete encounters problems on the home front as he and Trudy adjust to being married.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A boys' night out for Roger and Don ends badly, while Pete encounters problems on the home front as he and Trudy adjust to being married.

includedAssets.title: The Hobo Code
includedAssets.synopsis: Don is tormented as pieces of his secretive past begins to haunt him. Plus, as Peggy celebrates her new work success, not all of her colleagues are pleased for her.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Don is tormented as pieces of his past begins to haunt him. Plus, as Peggy celebrates her new success, not all of her colleagues are pleased for her.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Don is tormented as pieces of his secretive past begins to haunt him. Plus, as Peggy celebrates her new work success, not all of her colleagues are pleased for her.

includedAssets.title: Shoot
includedAssets.synopsis: A rival ad agency involves Betty in their bid to poach Don from Sterling Cooper. Plus, the team steps up its Nixon presidential campaign.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A rival ad agency involves Betty in their bid to poach Don from Sterling Cooper. Plus, the team steps up its Nixon presidential campaign.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A rival ad agency involves Betty in their bid to poach Don from Sterling Cooper. Plus, the team steps up its Nixon presidential campaign.

includedAssets.title: Long Weekend
includedAssets.synopsis: When Don loses an important account, Roger attempts to cheer him up while they're stuck in the city over the Labor Day weekend.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Don loses an important account, Roger attempts to cheer him up while they're stuck in the city over the Labor Day weekend.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Don loses an important account, Roger attempts to cheer him up while they're stuck in the city over the Labor Day weekend.

includedAssets.title: Indian Summer
includedAssets.synopsis: While Roger's work problems provide new opportunities for Don, Betty seeks new relief for her mounting frustrations.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Roger's work problems provide new opportunities for Don, Betty seeks new relief for her mounting frustrations.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Roger's work problems provide new opportunities for Don, Betty seeks new relief for her mounting frustrations.

includedAssets.title: Nixon vs. Kennedy
includedAssets.synopsis: The Sterling Cooper staff pull an all-nighter watching the Nixon-Kennedy election results. An ambitious Pete directly challenges Don.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Sterling Cooper staff pull an all-nighter watching the Nixon-Kennedy election results. An ambitious Pete directly challenges Don.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Sterling Cooper staff pull an all-nighter watching the Nixon-Kennedy election results. An ambitious Pete directly challenges Don.

includedAssets.title: The Wheel
includedAssets.synopsis: As Thanksgiving approaches, Don's responsibilities interfere with his home life. Betty uncovers a secret, while Peggy is given a new opportunity.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Thanksgiving approaches, Don's responsibilities interfere with his home life. Betty uncovers a secret, while Peggy is given a new opportunity.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Thanksgiving approaches, Don's responsibilities interfere with his home life. Betty uncovers a secret, while Peggy is given a new opportunity.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: The ambitious Peggy Olson (Elisabeth Moss) becomes the new secretary of mysterious advertising executive Don Draper (Jon Hamm) at the prestigious Sterling Cooper. First season of the multi-award-winning drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Elisabeth Moss is the ambitious new secretary of Jon Hamm's mysterious advertising executive in this first season of the multi-award-winning drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The ambitious Peggy Olson (Elisabeth Moss) becomes the new secretary of mysterious advertising executive Don Draper (Jon Hamm) at the prestigious Sterling Cooper. First season of the multi-award-winning drama.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: As Peggy rises through the ranks at Sterling Cooper, Don battles to keep his head above the water at home and at work. Critically-acclaimed second season starring Jon Hamm and Elisabeth Moss.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Peggy climbs the ladder at Sterling Cooper, Don battles to keep his head above the water at home and at work. Critically-acclaimed second season.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Peggy rises through the ranks at Sterling Cooper, Don battles to keep his head above the water at home and at work. Critically-acclaimed second season starring Jon Hamm and Elisabeth Moss.

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: There are tumultuous times ahead for the Sterling Cooper team in this third season as past sins come home to roost at a time of great political upheaval. Jon Hamm and Elisabeth Moss star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: There are tough times ahead for the Sterling Cooper team in this third season as past sins come home to roost at a time of great political upheaval.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: There are tumultuous times ahead for the Sterling Cooper team in this third season as past sins come home to roost at a time of great political upheaval. Jon Hamm and Elisabeth Moss star.

includedAssets.title: Season 4
includedAssets.synopsis: While Sterling Cooper Draper Pryce looks to establish itself, Don sinks deeper into despair as his personal life collapses. Fourth season of the critically-acclaimed drama starring Jon Hamm.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Sterling Cooper Draper Pryce looks to establish itself, Don sinks deeper into despair. Fourth season of the acclaimed drama starring Jon Hamm.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Sterling Cooper Draper Pryce looks to establish itself, Don sinks deeper into despair as his personal life collapses. Fourth season of the critically-acclaimed drama starring Jon Hamm.

includedAssets.title: Season 5
includedAssets.synopsis: Don struggles to balance his personal life with his responsibilities at Sterling Cooper Draper Pryce, while the rest of the team face painful new starts. Jon Hamm and Elisabeth Moss star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Don struggles to balance his personal life with his duties at Sterling Cooper Draper Pryce, while the rest of the team face painful new starts.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Don struggles to balance his personal life with his responsibilities at Sterling Cooper Draper Pryce, while the rest of the team face painful new starts. Jon Hamm and Elisabeth Moss star.

includedAssets.title: Season 6
includedAssets.synopsis: Old habits die hard for Don in the penultimate season of the ad agency drama starring Jon Hamm and Elisabeth Moss.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Old habits die hard for Don in the penultimate season of the ad agency drama starring Jon Hamm and Elisabeth Moss.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Old habits die hard for Don in the penultimate season of the ad agency drama starring Jon Hamm and Elisabeth Moss.

includedAssets.title: Season 7
includedAssets.synopsis: Change is afoot for Don and co as the 1970s dawns in the seventh and final season of the multi-award-winning drama. Jon Hamm and Elisabeth Moss star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Change is afoot for Don and co as the 1970s dawns in the seventh and final season of the multi-award-winning drama. Jon Hamm and Elisabeth Moss star.

includedIn.title: Mad Men
includedIn.synopsis: The ambitious Peggy Olson joins the stylish world of 1960s New York advertising as the new secretary of mysterious executive Don Draper at prestigious ad agency Sterling Cooper.

title: Mad Men Seasons 1-7
synopsis: Jon Hamm is mysterious ad man Don Draper in this stylish drama set in 1960s New York during the high-powered and glamorous Golden Age of advertising.
